Description: This is a barely used vintage white EVH Wolfgang Special guitar body made in Japan in 2010 - the serial number for the body is WG103501J (as pictured). This is a flat-top basswood body with black binding, and comes complete with the stock EVH Wolfgang zebra humbuckers. The pickups, 3-way switch, volume and tone controls, and output jack are all stock and in perfect working condition. Also included are the Floyd tremolo pivot post screws and the after-market black Schaller straplock buttons. The stock trem cavity cover and screws, as well as the black neck screws and ferrules (all pictured) are also included. The body and all hardware are literally in like-new condition - cosmetic and functionality. No dings, scratches, rust, or chips anywhere that I can see. You just have to add a Floyd and a neck and it's ready to go. Lastly, I have the original sales hang tag with serial number and the original chrome strap buttons (both not pictured).  All sales final. PayPal only. Payment via PayPal must be received within 24 hours of auction close. Shipping to USA only. I will ship this loaded body anywhere in the USA via USPS for $20. Email me with questions, check my feedback, bid with confidence, and have fun!
Title: EVH Wolfgang Japan body 2010 vintage white
